Reject a user's application to join the contest (Leader only)

get.summary: Get all games for a contest

Get contest details by contest ID

Stop an active contest and transition it to finished status (Leader only)
Register a team to participate in a game with optional grade

get.summary: Get a game-team relationship by ID

get.summary: Get all game-teams for a game

Get a specific member of a game team by user ID
Get all members and team details for a game (from Redis cache or DB)

post.description: Finalize the team and persist to database (Leader only, team must be full)
Invite a user to join the game team. Sends Discord notification if configured.

post.description: Accept a pending team invitation and join the team
Reject a pending team invitation
Remove a member from the game team (Leader only)

Transfer team leadership to another member (Leader only)

get.description: Get game details by game ID

patch.description: Update game details by game ID (Leader only, PENDING status only)
